title: Smart Data Models - RAMI4.0 Asset Administration Shell -AAS- Generic Submodel Element Property schema
description: Based on IDTA-01001-3-0, maps a generic RAMI4.0 SubmodelElement representing a PROPERTY or attribute of a referenced AAS. RAMI4.0 Standard

type.description: Property. It has to be RAMI4.0 I4SubmodelElementProperty NGSI Entity type to represent a RAMI4.0 AAS Digital Twin Submodel Operation component

refI4AssetId.description: Relationship. References the root Asset which this SubmodelElement belongs to

refI4AASId.description: Relationship. References the root Asset Administration Shell which this SubmodelElement belongs to

refI4SubmodelId.description: Relationship. References the root Submodel which this SubmodelElement belongs to

hasDataSpecification.description: Property. Element that can be extended by using data specification templates. A data specification template defines a named set of additional attributes an element may or shall have. RAMI4.0 specification

items.description: Property. Every element of the data specification

type.description: Property. Link, url or description of the specified data. DataSpecification template conformant to IEC61360

idShort.description: Property. Short id is the (short) name of the SubmodelElement within RAMI40 environment

category.description: Property. The category is a value that gives further meta information w.r.t. to the class of the element

modelType.description: Property. For the distinction of 'type' and 'instance', the term 'kind' is used

name.description: Property. Property of the item. Usually -Operation- is set for this type

descriptions.description: Property. For adding detailed knowledge about the Element in different languages

language.description: Property. Substring identifying the language. Acronym according to ISO 639-1

text.description: Property. The Description text is filled here

semanticId.description: Property. It refers to an external information source, which explains the formulation of the submodel element

keys.description: Property. Set of keys linked to the sematicID of the model in an object

items.description: Property. Every object containing the keys

local.description: Property. Describes a local or not item

index.description: Property. Integer value of the item

idType.description: Property. References the ID of the type

kind.description: Property. For the distinction of 'type' and 'instance', the term 'kind' is used

constraints.description: Property. Constraints which tells which values can be taken simultaneously. RAMI4.0 Asset Administration Shell specification. Version 3.0RC02

type.description: Property. Link, url, constraint ID (AAS Version 3.0RC02) or description of the constrain to be applied

value.description: Property.The given value in string/integer format

valueId.description: Property. ID of the item of the submodel elements

valueType.description: Property.The value type used in string format

dataObjectType.description: Property. Property of the item. string, integer, float, num etc. are used set for this type
